eu.amidst.dynamic.learning.parametric.bayesian

Class SVB

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.dynamic.learning.parametric.bayesian.SVB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BayesianLearningAlgorithm, ParameterLearningAlgorithm

    public class SVB
extends Object
implements BayesianLearningAlgorithm
    This class implements the BayesianLearningAlgorithm interface. It defines the Dynamic Streaming Variational Bayes (SVB) algorithm. TODO: By iterating several times over the data we can get better approximations. TODO: Trick. Initialize the Q's of the parameters variables with the final posterios in the previous iterations.
